verses.name: 1 Samuel 24:14
verses.text: After whom is the king of Israel come out? after whom dost thou pursue? after a dead dog, after a flea.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 24:15
verses.text: The Lord therefore be judge, and judge between me and thee, and see, and plead my cause, and deliver me out of thine hand.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 24:16
verses.text: And it came to pass, when David had made an end of speaking these words unto Saul, that Saul said, Is this thy voice, my son David? And Saul lifted up his voice, and wept.
